name: prompt-library-interface
description: Professional web interface for the Prompt Library system

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm run dev 2>&1 | tee ../logs/frontend.log
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && LOGS_DIR=../../logs npm run dev 2>&1 | tee ../logs/backend.log
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run dev 2>&1 | tee ../logs/frontend.log
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && LOGS_DIR=../../logs npm start 2>&1 | tee ../logs/backend.log
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
